metadata.title: 1.2mm - 5 mm Sterling Silver Plain Pallini Bead Ball Chain NecklaceNickel Free Italy
features: This is a dainty 16 inch Silver Bead Chain Necklace made of 1.5 mm beads linked together
Excellent Quality Finish Comes with SPRING RING Clasp Nickel Free Hypoallergenic
Solid Sterling Silver Made in Italy Excellent Quality Workmanship
Very Cute Dainty Silver Ball Chain great for pendants the size of a Quarter
description: This Classic Bead Chain or Ball Chain is made with round beads linked together. Solid Sterling Silver Made in Italy with excellent quality workmanship and Excellent Polish. Like all our other chains it's NICKEL FREE so it's Hypoallergenic as well. we carry this chain in sizes very Fine 1/32 inch (1.2 mm) Thin to nearly 1/4 inch (5mm) thick.
